title: Duminica la ora 6 AKA Sunday at 6 (Lucian Pintilie, 1965)
description:

After having seen the film again many decades after its first viewings my feeling is different. I believe that Lucian PintilieÃ¢â‚¬Ëœs first film is as daring in content and especially in its subliminal message as it is in its form which clearly shows already the hand of a skilled director, having learned and assimilated all the lessons of the French New Wave and placing them in the service of his cinematographic message.
